column4: hi all, I installed ubuntu on friend's computer.  He has plugged in wireless usb device but keeps getting keyring password request.  I don't know what he has done, but he cant get it to accept the password. Is there a way of resetting this?
Are you trying to change his login password...?

I do not want to change login password....I just want the keyring to be the same password.  However, I think my friend F'ed it up and can't remember what he put in there for keyring password because he gets caught in a loop where it asks for keyring, he enters login, but it keeps asking again and again
